ExampleDefinition.Description:
The Point-Cloud Chart demo shows how to create high-performance 3D Point Cloud with two-dimensional markers chart using the SciChart 3D Component.
The 3D Point Cloud chart is defined by the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.XyzDataSeries3D%603.html']XyzDataSeries3D[/url] and the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.RenderableSeries.ScatterRenderableSeries3D.html']ScatterRenderableSeries3D[/url]. A texture is drawn at each individual point to allow a high-performance solution allowing many points.
Scatter points can be colored individually, programmatically selected and scaled using the [url='http://www.scichart.com/documentation/win/current/SciChart.Charting3D~SciChart.Charting3D.Model.PointMetadata3D.html']PointMetadata3D[/url] class. PointMetadata also allows you to tag individual points with a business object of any type.
